General.Name: Australian Mines Limited
General.Description: Australian Mines Limited engages in the mining and exploration of mineral properties in Australia. The company primarily explores for cobalt, nickel, and scandium deposits. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Sconi project located in North Queensland, Australia. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Brisbane, Australia.

1.Name: Mr. Lee Gordon Guthrie B.Sc., M.A.I.C.D.
1.Title: Independent Exec. Director

3.Name: Mr. Oliver  Carton BJuris, L.L.B., LLB
3.Title: Company Sec.
